Name: Crusader's March
About the game: Crusader's March is a casual top-down roguelite with rock, paper, scissors based combat where you have to make sure the correct units are on the front lines lest they be thrown into the proverbial meat grinder. March from castle to castle defeating their owners and taking what's theirs. Grow your army from a handful of units to almost one-hundred soldiers. Upgrade their combat effectiveness with upgrades ranging from armor and damage multipliers to shoot speed and better shields. Command Grow Upgrade Complete Challenges
